MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH51 postcode area of Bo'Ness. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:15am on 24th April
